paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant V122I, including penetrance data and individual case details.

patients.phenotype: AL amyloidosis with Mayo Stage IIIA cardiac and soft tissue involvement

individual_records.phenotype_details: AL amyloidosis with cardiac and soft tissue involvement
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient was diagnosed with AL amyloidosis with Mayo Stage IIIA cardiac and soft tissue involvement.

functional_data.summary: The V122I variant is associated with hereditary ATTR cardiac amyloidosis.

variants.population_frequency: 3.9% of Black individuals carry TTR mutations, particularly V122I.
variants.additional_notes: The patient has a family history of cardiac deaths, which may indicate a hereditary component.
key_quotes: the V122I TTR variant may predispose her to develop hereditary ATTR cardiac amyloidosis in the future

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the variant was clearly described in the case report.
